resources.string: Get into plank position, with your hands under but slightly outside of your shoulders. Lower your body until your chest nearly touches the floor. Pause, then push back to the starting position as quickly as possible.
Get into plank position, with your hands as wide apart as you can. Lower your body until your chest nearly touches the floor. Pause, then push back to the starting position as quickly as possible.
Push Ups with one Arm you little piece of shit!
Press your hands against each other at the height of your nipples :D
The steeper the incline, the less body weight you will need to work push.

What goes up, must come down. These push-ups will help you target your upper chest and deltoid muscles specifically. It will also add more of your body weight to the exercise than a standard push-up, thus making it harder.
Lowering yourself very slowly (5sec) down into a push-up and pushing back equally as slow into your start position.
